levelList.name: No More Tests
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] ได้รับ 3 [HitDamageUp] ในเทิร์นถัดไป
[WhenUse] If the main target has 3+ [MiddleFingerBook], convert all Coins on this Skill to [SuperCoin]s

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง 1 [Binding] ในเทิร์นถัดไป

levelList.name: Promised Suffering
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with the highest [MiddleFingerBook] Stack
[WhenUse] หากเป้าหมายมี 3+ [MiddleFingerBook], convert all Coins on this Skill to [SuperCoin]s

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง 1 [Vulnerable] this turn and ในเทิร์นถัดไป
[OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง 1 [Vulnerable] this turn and ในเทิร์นถัดไป
[OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง ([MiddleFingerBook] on the target x 3) Blunt bonus damage
[OnSucceedAttack] Remove all [MiddleFingerBook] on the target

levelList.name: Enough games
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] Heal all allies' SP by 10
[EndBattle] If there are Panicked allies, recover them from Panic at the ในเทิร์นถัดไป Start and reset their SP to 0
[EndBattle] มอบ 1 [HitResultUp] to all allies, including this unit

levelList.name: COMPLETE AND TOTAL EXTERMINATION!!!
levelList.desc:
Can Clash with this Skill regardless of Speed
If the main target has 5+ [MiddleFingerBook], แต้มปิดท้ายสกิล +5
[EndSkill] Remove [MiddleFingerBook] from all targets that were hit

coindescs.desc: [SuperCoin]
[OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง ([MiddleFingerBook] on the target x 10) Blunt bonus damage

levelList.name: Startling Strike
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] หากเป้าหมายมี 5+ [Burst], แต้มแคลชสกิล +1

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง 2 [Burst]

levelList.name: Perforating Kill
levelList.desc:

[WhenUse] ได้รับ 3 [LegStrength]

levelList.name: Cursewrit Butcherblade - Blinkstep
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with [BurstAgility]
Deal +15% damage for every 2 Speed difference between this unit and the target (max 60%)
[WhenUse] แต้มเหรียญ +1 for every 5 [Burst] on the target (max 2)
[WhenUse] แต้มเริ่มต้นสกิล +1 for every 2 [Burst] จำนวนครั้ง on the target (max 3)
[EndSkill] At 10+ Speed, and if the target is defeated, Reuse this Skill against a random enemy (once per turn)
